mapper.select: SELECT MEMNO AS "no", NAME AS "name", ID AS "id", PW AS "pw", ADDR AS "addr", TEL AS "tel" FROM MEMBER

select it.itemno as "no", it.title as "title", it.artist as "artist", im.url as "img" ,it.price as "price" from item it inner join image im on it.itemno = im.itemno where it.itemno between 1 and 10 order by it.itemno asc
mapper.update: UPDATE TEMP SET TEMP_NO=#{no}, TEMP_NAME=#{name}, TEMP_DESC=#{desc}, DEL_YN=#{delYn} WHERE TEMP_NO=#{rowNum}
